Title: Kinect Spots
Description: Kinect Spots is a small little app that displays a stylized bubble image based on the input from the Microsoft Kinect's camera.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Kinect Spots is a small little app that displays a stylized bubble image based on the input from the Microsoft Kinect's camera.


Requires the Kindect SDK 1.0, available at http://kinectforwindows.org/
